message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a valuable asset that's worth every penny.  I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial deal. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I'm willing to make a serious investment, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.
Bob, I understand your position, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's settle at $1,650,000. This price still gives you a great deal, and it's a fair compromise for me. Let's close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that number. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,550,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
Bob, I hear you, and I'm willing to go down to $1,600,000. This is a very fair offer considering the value of the product. I think this is a price that will work for both of us. What do you say?

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,525,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $1,525,000 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,575,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and it's closer to what I need. Let's close this deal and move forward.

I understand that you're trying to get as close to your target price as possible, but I'm still trying to save as much as I can. I'm willing to meet you at $1,525,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
